abstract: Bank of America has postponed plans to take ABN Amro to court, preferring to wait until the Dutch Supreme Court rules on the Dutch bank’s sale of LaSalle Bank, its American unit, a Bank of America spokesman said on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has postponed plans to take ABN Amro to court, preferring to wait until the Dutch Supreme Court rules on the Dutch bank’s sale of LaSalle Bank, its American unit, a Bank of America spokesman said on Friday.

headline.main: Bank of America Holds Off on ABN Amro Lawsuit
